data.title: Broad Town Village Hall – WVHA
data.text:
ABOUT BROAD TOWN VILLAGE HALL

Broad Town Village Hall is situated in the village of Broad Town, just outside Wootton Bassett. There is a main Hall with a permanent stage, kitchen and toilet facilities. There is a bar run by the Social Club, and good parking facilities. The Hall is very well maintained, clean and bright. There is easy access from Wootton Bassett but a peaceful village atmosphere.

ROOMS AVAILABLE

There is a main hall with a small raised stage area, a kitchen and a bar (run by the Social Club).

Current capacity is 99

FACILITIES

Parking, fully equipped kitchen. Wifi available

We are very pleased to be fortunate to currently have free WiFi provided by Gigaclear

HALL ADDRESS

Broad Town Village Hall, Broad Town Road, Broad Town, Swindon, SN4 7RL

BOOKINGS & ENQUIRIES

Email: broadtown@wvha.org.uk

Tel: 01793 731 281

For more information about this hall including licensing, events and capacity, please see the ‘Additional Information’ section to the right or below this description (on mobile devices). Facilities and features for this hall are listed at the top of the page (red icons).
